name: EDD Disable Purchase Receipt
author: Andrew Munro, Sumobi

sections.description:
This plugin requires Easy Digital Downloads.

Sometimes it may be necessary to disable the standard purchase receipt that is sent to the customer. Install and activate this plugin and the purchase receipts will be disabled completely.

Looking for the perfect Easy Digital Downloads theme?

https://wordpress.org/themes/shop-front/

Shop Front is a simple, responsive & easily extensible theme for the Easy Digital Downloads plugin. It also functions perfectly without the plugin as a standard WordPress blog. A free child theme for modifications can be downloaded from http://sumobi.com/shop/shop-front-child-theme as well as other free and paid add-ons to enhance the functionality and styling.

sections.installation:
1. Unpack the entire contents of this plugin zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder locally
  2. Upload to your site
  3. Navigate to wp-admin/plugins.php on your site (your WP Admin plugin page)
  4. Activate this plugin

OR you can just install it with WordPress by going to Plugins >> Add New >> and type this plugin’s name

short_description: Disables the standard purchase receipt sent to the customer
